isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 2000, 4000, 8000 - CHASSIS ACCESSORIES - DESCRIPTION - Transfer Case Shift Switch and Front Axle Engagement Switch and Indicator Lamp

svcproc.title: Transfer Case Shift Switch and Front Axle Engagement Switch and Indicator Lamp

svcsubproc.title: Transfer Case Shift Switch
svcsubproc.para: A transfer case is used to provide a low range and to divide driveshaft power between the front and rear axles in all-wheel drive vehicles. An electric control circuit with indicator light is used to select High or Low range.

svcsubproc.title: Front Axle Engagement Switch and Indicator Lamp
svcsubproc.para: The front axle engagement switch is used to activate the front axle function of the transfer case.
Once the front axle drive gears engage, the front axle warning light switch closes and the dash warning light turns on.
